translation.en: Get back here, you little hubcap! It's…
translation.zh: 快回来 你这小精豆子！赶紧…

translation.en: [Mama] All right, you've got nowhere to go!
translation.zh: 好啦 小姑娘 现在你没处跑了！

translation.en: Let's all just go home and take a nice, warm bath.
translation.zh: 赶紧跟我们回家 热乎乎地洗个澡澡

translation.en: Stay on her tail. I'll cut her off at the pass!
translation.zh: 跟紧她 我去路口堵她！

translation.en: Huh? Why aren't you in school?
I got ya! I got ya! I…
You fall for that every time.
Another peaceful day in Bumperton Hills.
translation.zh: 邦珀顿山今天也很太平
你也是 一会儿电话我！
她快甩掉你啦 卡婶
哈雷 别说风凉话啦

translation.en: Come on. It's your turn to take a bath.
translation.zh: 来吧 轮到你洗澡澡啦

translation.en: Maybe you could teach Chrissy to love baths too.
translation.zh: 那你也教教科丽茜怎么爱上洗澡吧
现在 由科丽茜预报天气
我们跳出去 准备好了吗？
海盗船！ 嗬 伙计

translation.en: Choppy water, choppy water, choppy water.
[gasps] I know! Close your eyes and pretend real hard.
translation.zh: 有了！闭上眼睛 用力想着扮家家

translation.en: Hey, Chrissy. You look so cute bouncing on that trampoline.
translation.zh: 嗨 科丽茜 你跳蹦床的样子真可爱

translation.en: Of course. Chrissy. You are just the cutest thing ever!
translation.zh: 当然啦 科丽茜 你最可爱啦！

translation.en: What you doin'? Blowin' dandelions? Makin' wishes?
translation.zh: 你在做什么呀？ 吹蒲公英？ 许愿？

translation.en: You are just the cutest thing ever!
-[Bobby blowing] -Keep trying, little guy. You can do it.
translation.zh: 继续努力 小家伙 你能做到

translation.en: Looks like someone needs some holdin'.
translation.zh: 看来有的小朋友需要牵手手呢
长命百岁 不是 怎么了 小老弟!
好可爱 你俩都好可爱！

translation.en: Oh, I-- I don't know that song.
translation.zh: 哦 我没听过那首曲子

translation.en: Uh, this is all so very cute.
[Carley] That is the cutest thing ever!
Well, you see, my dad was gonna throw it out, but I saved it.
translation.zh: 你看 我爸本来要扔掉的但我把它留下了

translation.en: Because it reminded me of you.
Wanna go help me add it to my gallery space?
translation.zh: 要不要帮忙把它搬到我画廊去？

translation.en: Here you go, Chrissy. I got you a special treat.
translation.zh: 快看 科丽茜 我给你拿了很特别的好吃的

translation.en: Nice try, but raisins are good for you,
translation.zh: 想得美 不过葡萄干对身体好

translation.en: and makes Mommy feel better about that milkshake I gave you yesterday.
translation.zh: 再说 妈妈昨天给你喝了奶昔有点过意不去
哦 你好啊 科丽茜

translation.en: Chasing a cookie in a jar, I see.
translation.zh: 我看你这是追着曲奇罐子跑呐

translation.en: I remember the first time I chased a sugary snack.
translation.zh: 还记得我第一回追甜食

translation.en: Fastest crumb cake I ever-- Don't mean to be rude, but I'm going left. Bye!
translation.zh: 我还没见过跑那么快的奶酥蛋糕…不是我无礼 我得往左走啦 再见！

translation.en: Hey, kids. Who wants a healthy snack?
translation.zh: 嘿 孩子们 谁想吃健康零食？

translation.en: I-- I don't have any cookies!
Please don't eat me! I'm not as sweet as I look!
translation.zh: 求求你们 别吃我！我没有长得那么甜！

translation.en: You ate all your raisins! Good job, Chrissy.
translation.zh: 好样的 科丽茜 你把葡萄干吃光了！

translation.en: I think you deserve a cookie.
translation.zh: 我觉得该给你奖励块曲奇饼干
最后一块葡萄干燕麦曲奇饼干
宝贝独角车！颜色亮闪闪！

translation.en: ♪ Baby Unicar! Colors so bright! Travels the uni-- ♪
translation.zh: 宝贝独角车！颜色亮闪闪！穿行宇宙中…

translation.en: Now, you know we don't draw on the wall…
translation.zh: 你知道 墙上不可以画画…

translation.en: [blubbers] No. No drawing on the wall.
translation.zh: 不行 不许在墙上画画

translation.en: That is not what I meant! Chrissy, I'm warning you.
translation.zh: 我不是那个意思！科丽茜 我警告你哦

translation.en: Okay, you need to stay on the couch until time out is over.
translation.zh: 好了 科丽茜反省时间结束前不可以离开沙发

translation.en: I'm setting this timer for five minutes.
You can get up when the face goes from sad to happy.
translation.zh: 等哭脸变成笑脸 你就可以下来了

translation.en: I'll be just in the other room.

translation.zh: 宝贝独角车！颜色亮闪闪！

translation.en: ♪ Travels the universe Making wrongs right ♪
translation.zh: 穿行宇宙中 邪恶全驱赶

translation.en: Stay on the couch until time out is over.
translation.zh: 反省时间必须待在沙发上
宝贝独角车！颜色亮闪闪！
穿行宇宙中 邪恶全…

translation.en: [gasps] Oh no! No TV during time outs.
translation.zh: -哦 不！-反省时间不许看电视

translation.en: Well, at least it comes off easy.
translation.zh: 哎 至少很容易擦掉
我的后备箱可没那么大

translation.en: -No, you see, Chrissy, I was just-- -That's it! Time out!
translation.zh: -不 科丽茜 我只是…-好吧！反省时间！

translation.en: Don't leave couch until sad to happy.
translation.zh: 等哭脸变成笑脸 你就可以下来了

translation.en: Uh, Chrissy, you set it for an hour.
translation.zh: 科丽茜 你定了一个小时
请不要再说话了 再见

translation.en: -[Mama] Where to next, everybody? -Last one to the ball pit's a rusty car!
translation.zh: 咱们接下来去哪里？ 最后一个到球池的是锈铁皮！

translation.en: Are you two eyeing that big Baby Unicar toy?
translation.zh: 你们俩想要宝贝独角车？

translation.en: One hundred tickets is a lot,
but it's worth it 'cause it's our last one.
translation.zh: 但绝对值得因为我们只剩最后一个了
宝贝独角车 我来啦！
迈克游艺厅各位玩家请注意

translation.en: Last chance to bring your tickets in to exchange them for a prize!
translation.zh: 换领奖品的最后时限快到咯！
不对 是我的 准备好！
真是我吃过最好吃的香蕉
科丽茜 吃你的香蕉吧！

translation.en: Hey, you two. What prizes can I get you today?
translation.zh: 你们两个今天想要什么奖品？

translation.en: Whoa! Okay. I'm gonna go count these up.

translation.zh: 好了 这是你们的奖品

translation.en: Sorry, guys. You both only have 50 tickets each. Pencils are all you can get.
translation.zh: 不好意思 你们每人只有50张只能换铅笔

translation.en: Maybe if you put your tickets together,
you could share the Baby Unicar toy?
Chrissy best hide and seeker. -She is pretty good. -Mm-hmm.
translation.zh: -科丽茜捉迷藏最棒了-她很厉害的

translation.en: Well, we'll see who's the best.
translation.zh: 我们走着瞧 看看谁最厉害

translation.en: Now it's my turn to seek and I'm gonna find you all in no time.
translation.zh: 现在换我来找不一会儿就把你们全都找出来

translation.en: Chrissy, if I can't find you, you can have cookies for dinner.
translation.zh: 科丽茜 要是我找不到你就让你吃曲奇饼干当晚饭

translation.en: Ready or not, here I come!
Come out, come out, wherever you are!
translation.zh: 出来呀 出来呀 不管你在哪！

translation.en: -I thought you'd never find me here. -[Papa chuckles]
translation.zh: 我还以为你找不到这里呢
-来吧 咱们去找其他人-好吧

translation.en: -If we split up, we can cover more ground. -Good idea.
translation.zh: -分头行动 可以扩大搜索范围-好主意

translation.en: -[Cory] It came from the closet! -Chrissy, they're coming!
translation.zh: -衣柜里有动静！-不好 科丽茜 他们来了！

translation.en: [scoffs] Looks like they found us, Chrissy.
translation.zh: 被他们发现了 科丽茜

translation.en: Looks like Chrissy's better than you thought.
translation.zh: 看来科丽茜比你想的还要厉害

translation.en: What? She just got lucky! We'll find her.
translation.zh: 什么？ 她只是运气好！我们会找到她的

translation.en: -What? -Freddie, why are you in my house?
translation.zh: -干嘛？-弗莱迪 你跑我家来干嘛？

translation.en: I'm playing hide and seek with Kimmy and Timmy. They'll never find me here.
translation.zh: 我在跟基米和提米捉迷藏他们永远也找不到这来

translation.en: -What should we do? -I don't know where else to look.
translation.zh: -我们该怎么办？-已经没地方可找了

translation.en: Okay, you win! Chrissy, you're the best at hide and seek!
translation.zh: 科丽茜 你赢了！捉迷藏你最厉害！
有时候我真有点怕科丽茜

translation.en: Whoa, you keep jumping like that and there won't be any water left!
translation.zh: 再这么跳 一会儿就没水了！

translation.en: Time to head home, Chrissy. Say goodbye to Catalina.
translation.zh: 科丽茜 该回家了 跟卡塔琳娜说再见

translation.en: Okay, just one more. I'm gonna say goodbye to Cat's mom.
translation.zh: 好吧 最后一次我去跟小卡的妈妈告别

translation.en: Those kids just love being in the water.
translation.zh: 孩子们就爱在水里扑腾

translation.en: -Nice circle! -How are we gonna make this triangle?
translation.zh: -这圆圈真不赖！-我们怎么把它变成三角形？

translation.en: Can we please have crumpets for dinner?
translation.zh: 晚饭吃松饼嘛 好不好？
如果船会飞 晚饭就吃松饼

translation.en: -All right, see you next week. -See you then.
[Papa] Hmm, now it just needs a really funny joke.
translation.zh: 这里只需要加个好玩的笑话

translation.en: Let's see what's on the internet.
[Papa] ♪ A great idea will come to me ♪
Ooh, someone commented on my new profile pic!
translation.zh: 有人给我的新头像留言！

translation.en: I should probably take a power nap before lunch.
translation.zh: 我应该在午饭前睡个觉 充充电
“科丽茜 你怎么又迟到了？”

translation.en: Get off my bumper, Bobby. Are we doing it or not?
translation.zh: 别找茬 鲍比 到底玩不玩？

translation.en: [Mama] …additional concrete to support the new structure.
translation.zh: 我们得加些水泥 支撑新结构

translation.en: Oh, hold on, Julia, I need to take this call.
translation.zh: 稍等 茱莉亚 我接个电话

translation.en: Hi, hon, it's me, Papa. Have you seen my snuggle socks?
translation.zh: 喂 亲爱的 我是爸爸你见我的绒绒袜没？

translation.en: Top drawer. Wait, are you about to take a nap?
translation.zh: 在顶层抽屉里 等等 你是想打盹儿？

translation.en: I'm back. Let's open the blueprints and take a look at the foundation.
translation.zh: 我回来了 咱们来打开设计图看一看地基部分
-嗨 科丽茜-嗨 怀尔德

translation.en: One and a two and a three, four, five.
[grunts] You're getting so big. Don't you grow up too fast, okay?
translation.zh: 你都这么大了 可别长得太快哟知道吗？

translation.en: -Wait. Did you just wink at yourself? -Yep.
translation.zh: -等等 你刚在对自己眨眼睛吗？-嗯

translation.en: I just need to draw a perfectly straight line.
translation.zh: 只需要画一条完美的直线

translation.en: Ah! Oh, Chrissy. You scared me.
translation.zh: 哎呀 科丽茜 你吓死我了

translation.en: Do you have a case of the hiccups?
I have just the thing. Drink some water.
translation.zh: 我有解决办法 喝点水

translation.en: Oh, I know. Let's try this.
Now take a drink of water.
I'm just helping Chrissy cure her hiccups.
Oh. Well, I have an idea.
My mom always gave me a spoonful of sugar to cure my hiccups.
translation.zh: 每次我打嗝 我妈妈就喂一勺糖

translation.en: I don't know if that'll work.

translation.zh: 盐？ 芥末？ 应该不是醋

translation.en: No, we're just trying to get rid of Chrissy's hiccups.
translation.zh: 没有 我们在帮科丽茜治打嗝

translation.en: Oh, my mom has a neat trick for that.
You just have to hold your breath for ten seconds.
-[hiccups] -Oh, Chrissy! Do you have the hiccups?
translation.zh: 哎呀 科丽茜！打嗝了？

translation.en: A good laugh always gets rid of them for me.
What do you call a sick train?
translation.zh: 你管生病的火车叫什么？

translation.en: The best way to get rid of hiccups is by scaring them away.
translation.zh: 治打嗝 最好的方法是吓唬

translation.en: When I get the hiccups, I fly corkscrews through the air. That always helps.
translation.zh: 我一打嗝 就在空中翻跟斗 可管用了

translation.en: You'll just have to bounce them out.
-My mom gave me a spoonful of sugar-- -Yeah, we tried that.
translation.zh: -我妈妈会给我喂勺糖…-知道 我们试过了

translation.en: This mask will definitely scare those hiccups out of Chrissy.
translation.zh: 这个面具肯定能把科丽茜的嗝儿止住

translation.en: I knew laughter would do the trick.
translation.zh: 我就知道 笑最管用

translation.en: Look at me! Look at me!
Hot chocolate. Get your hot chocolate here!
translation.zh: 热巧克力快来喝暖烘烘的热巧克力！

translation.en: What a nice day to go sledding.
translation.zh: 真是个滑雪橇的好日子
热巧克力 好美味啊！

translation.en: Whoa, slow down, Chrissy. Wait for me.
translation.zh: 慢着点 科丽茜 等等我

translation.en: Let's go! Let's go! Let's go!
Uh, Chrissy, people say the best part of sledding is actually the view.
translation.zh: 科丽茜 大家都说滑雪橇最享受的是风景

translation.en: Why don't we just stay up here and get some hot chocolate?
translation.zh: 不如咱们就待在这 喝热巧克力吧？

translation.en: Chrissy! Wait, wait, wait. No! No! No! No!
[Papa chuckles] You know what? The best part of sledding really is the view.
translation.zh: 你别说 滑雪橇最享受的还真是风景

translation.en: Huh? Sorry, Chrissy, I can't. I have a lot of work to do.
translation.zh: 抱歉 科丽茜 我顾不上我还有很多工作呢

translation.en: Oh, maybe you could go play with Mama and Cory?
translation.zh: 去找妈妈和科里玩怎么样？

translation.en: -We're actually in the middle of a game. -Yeah, ages five and up.
translation.zh: -我们正玩着呢-就是 只限五岁以上

translation.en: -Maybe you can play with Papa? -Papa no play time.
translation.zh: -你去跟爸爸玩好不好？-爸爸没时间

translation.en: It lets you control someone like you control the TV. Watch. Hey, Cory!
translation.zh: 你可以像遥控电视一样遥控别人你看 嘿 科里！

translation.en: Oh, hey, is that super remote?
translation.zh: 嘿 那不是超级遥控器吗？
-我们多久没玩那个游戏…-暂停！

translation.en: But the rule is that you have to play along no matter what. Play!
translation.zh: 但玩超级遥控器的规则 是必须听话播放！

translation.en: I remember the fun we used to…
Hey! Who put this banana in my card pile?
translation.zh: 我说！谁往我卡片上放香蕉的？
不错呀 把她支走了

translation.en: You never do stuff like that to me, do you?

translation.zh: -游戏时间！-科丽茜 我说了…

translation.en: Just don't use it on me, okay?
translation.zh: 只是别用在我身上 好吗？

translation.en: Huh? Where did my pencil go?
Very funny, but I need to get back to work.
translation.zh: 真好玩 但我得继续工作了

translation.en: This comic is gonna take forever to finish.
Done. Bye, Mr. Pencil! I'm hungry. Time for a snack! See you later, Chrissy!
translation.zh: 完成 铅笔先生 再见！我饿了吃零食！回见 科丽茜！

translation.en: Hi, whatcha doing? Making nachos? None for me. Ketchup. Corn. Pan. No.
translation.zh: 嗨 干嘛呢？做玉米片？我不要 番茄酱 玉米 锅 不对

translation.en: -Nothing like a cold glass of juice! -Pause.

translation.zh: -播放-哎呀 洒得到处都是！

translation.en: -You two look like you're having fun. -Mama, play time!
translation.zh: -你俩似乎玩得很开心-妈妈 游戏时间！

translation.en: I can't. I gotta get back to my game.
translation.zh: 不行 我那边也正玩着呢

translation.en: Looks like I'm in control now.
-Play. Pause. Play. Pause. Play. -Mama, what are you doing?
translation.zh: -播放 暂停 播放 暂停 播放-妈妈 你在做什么？

translation.en: We're still playing! Papa, do something!
translation.zh: 我们还在玩呢！爸爸 快想办法！

translation.en: [Cory] Come on, Chrissy. You've had your fun.
translation.zh: 好了 科丽茜 你已经玩够了

translation.en: Time to get back to work.
Well, I guess no more super remote.
translation.zh: 看来超级遥控器是没了

translation.en: Look, everyone! It's the saltshaker of madness!
translation.zh: 大家快看！是疯狂小盐瓶！

translation.en: If you get hit by the magic salt,

translation.zh: 朋友们 到品茶时间了

translation.en: Okay, so I think we have all the resources we need.
translation.zh: 好吧 我觉得装备已经很齐全了
你说得对 是有股臭味

translation.en: I've got some work to do though. Do you think you can take care of it?
translation.zh: 我手头有工作 你来解决怎么样？

translation.en: All right, I'm back. Let's raid this dungeon!
translation.zh: 好了 我回来了我们一起突袭地牢吧！
快看 弗莱迪 第一位客人上门啦！

translation.en: Guaranteed to make you smell like the greatest garbage truck in the world.
translation.zh: 保证带给你世界顶级垃圾车的味道

translation.en: I wouldn't go in there if I were you.
translation.zh: 你还是一会儿再进去的好

translation.en: I don't know who used the bathroom last,
translation.zh: 我也不知道谁刚上过厕所

translation.en: but might just be best to, you know, let it air out.
translation.zh: 不过 最好还是先散散味儿

translation.en: Yeah! We need to use the bathroom!
Hey, Chrissy. I see you found the smell.
translation.zh: 嗨 科丽茜 看来你找到源头啦

translation.en: I knew you could do it.
Wait. What the… Where's the toilet?
translation.zh: 等等 怎么…马桶哪去了？

translation.en: -[dance music] -Welcome to the Lucky Lounge. Here you go, boys.
translation.zh: -欢迎来到幸运走廊-拿着 伙计们

translation.en: Thank you, Miss Fenderson. Enjoy yourself this evening.
translation.zh: 谢谢 芬德森小姐 祝你今晚愉快
-只有赢票大家才能进入-我有票

translation.en: You need more than that if you wanna party with the high rollers.
translation.zh: 想跟大玩家玩 这点票可不够

translation.en: [game] Sorry! Too bad! Sorry! Almost! Too bad!
translation.zh: 抱歉！太可惜了！抱歉！就差一点！太可惜了！

translation.en: Crispy! Combo! Awesome! Crispy! Combo! Perfect score!
translation.zh: 漂亮！ 连击！ 太棒了！漂亮！ 连击！ 完美得分！

translation.en: You got a lucky penny. Better hang onto it.
translation.zh: 看来你拿到好运硬币了 可别弄丢咯
祝你今天捕鱼好运 眯眯眼

translation.en: Ha! Luck's got nothing to do with it.
I finally got the white whale!

translation.zh: 硬币没好运！科丽茜好运！
卡尔森小姐 这边请

translation.en: [announcer] Welcome to the 65th annual Bumper-Ball Championship!
translation.zh: 欢迎来到第65届充气弹力球冠军年赛！

translation.en: But first, a quick word from our sponsor.
translation.zh: 首先带来赞助商的消息

translation.en: I'm gonna go upstairs and do some work.
-You're gonna take a nap, aren't you? -What? No!
translation.zh: -你是去打盹吧？-什么？ 才不是呢！

translation.en: Morning, Chrissy. We're babysitting one of your friends today.
translation.zh: 早上好 科丽茜 今天我们要帮忙照看你一位朋友
你好 科丽茜卡尔森

translation.en: I left a snack for you two on the table!
translation.zh: 桌上给你俩留了零食哦！

translation.en: We've got the match of the century here today, folks!
translation.zh: 伙计们 今天可是一场世纪之战！

translation.en: It's the long-awaited showdown between two fated rivals.
translation.zh: 是大家期待已久的宿敌决战

translation.en: The Mean Green Machines versus the Tin Can Vans!
translation.zh: 绿魔车队对决罐头车队！

translation.en: Who will take the win? Who will come out on top?
translation.zh: 谁能拿下冠军？谁会更胜一筹？
科丽茜 快看 冰激凌！

translation.en: The Tin Can Vans have snatched the ball from the offense.
translation.zh: 罐头车队从进攻队手中抢过球

translation.en: They are headed downfield. Look at that fancy wheel work.
translation.zh: 他们直奔前场 瞧瞧底盘功夫多厉害

translation.en: And goal! It's a goal for the Tin Can Vans!
The Mean Greens are left in shock.
But they don't leave them a second to celebrate.
translation.zh: 但他们并不给对手庆祝的时间

translation.en: Both teams are scrambling. I can barely see the ball, folks!
translation.zh: 双方你争我夺球在哪里都难以分辨！

translation.en: It's been found. The Mean Greens have the ball.
translation.zh: 看到了 现在是绿魔拿球

translation.en: We're off to the races! What a beautiful maneuver.
translation.zh: 比赛愈演愈烈！多么漂亮的动作

translation.en: Go, Mean Greens! Show 'em who's boss!
translation.zh: 绿魔队加油！让他们见识见识！

translation.en: Ah-ha! And it's a goal for Green!
The Vans manage to break away! It looks like a clean--
translation.zh: 罐头车队成功突围！似乎是一次很利落的…

translation.en: Wait a minute. What just happened?
translation.zh: 等一下 刚才怎么回事？

translation.en: A fan has come onto the field. He's stolen the ball!
translation.zh: 一位球迷冲进赛场 把球偷走了！
能有人快叫体育场保安吗？

translation.en: Can no one get their tires on the slippery suspect?
translation.zh: 难道谁也撵不上那个滑头？

translation.en: Oh, they got him. The fan is down!
translation.zh: 抓住他了 球迷被制服了！

translation.en: They're really giving him a walloping!
The match is heating up. There's no sign of it slowing down.
translation.zh: 比赛进入白热化没有任何放慢节奏的迹象

translation.en: And those victory dances are nothing to sneeze at.
translation.zh: 而那胜利之舞可不是闹着玩的

translation.en: The walls are closing in. There's nowhere left to turn.
translation.zh: 眼看着已经逼入死角已经没有转向的余地

translation.en: But wait! A teammate is wide open. Waiting in the wings like an angel.
translation.zh: 且慢！一位队友已经拉开阵势像天使一样蓄势待发

translation.en: A beautiful pass. And beautifully received.
translation.zh: 一记漂亮的传球 被漂亮地接住了

translation.en: It's all come down to this. One final goal will decide the match.
translation.zh: 成败在此一举 一球决胜负

translation.en: With seconds on the clock, who will take the championship title?
translation.zh: 赛时将尽 谁能夺得冠军头衔？

translation.en: It's another mad scramble. The play goes haywire.
translation.zh: 又是一场疯狂的争夺大家都杀红了眼

translation.en: Cars are sent head over wheels.
The ball is in the air. It's anyone's game.
translation.zh: 球在空中 谁都可能有机会

translation.en: It's all over, folks! It's a tie!
Oh, look at you two having so much fun together.
translation.zh: 瞧瞧你们两个 玩得多开心啊

translation.en: Oh, there's only one left. I'll go get some cups so we can split it.
translation.zh: 哎呀 只剩一包了 我去拿杯子分一分

translation.en: We wouldn't leave you hanging, folks! The match moves into overtime.
translation.zh: 我们不会让大家久等的！比赛进入加时赛

translation.en: Okay. This goes in here. And this…
translation.zh: 好了 这个放在这 这个嘛…
-现在妈妈躲猫猫-抱歉 科丽茜

translation.en: Hop on out of that box, please.
We used to make home movies of you and Cory with this all the time.
translation.zh: 以前 我们用这个给你和科里拍了好多家庭录像

translation.en: [Papa] Here we go! Hi, Chrissy. Say hi to the camera!
translation.zh: 好了！嗨 科丽茜 跟镜头说嗨！

translation.en: Okay, that was fun. Now I need to get back to--
translation.zh: 好吧 很有趣 但我得接着…

translation.en: I just have so much to do.
[Papa] Yeah. There's Cory, walking down the hill. Hi, Cory! Where's Chrissy?
translation.zh: 看到了 科里正从山上下来嗨 科里！科丽茜去哪了？

translation.en: Now, when you're hunting a ghost, you have to be very quiet.
translation.zh: 现在你们可是在狩猎鬼怪一定要非常安静
哦 科丽茜第一次去餐厅！

translation.en: And what would Madame like to order?

translation.zh: 亲爱的 那是要便便的表情！

translation.en: [Mama laughs] That's right! And what do puppy cars do?
translation.zh: 没错！那小狗车车做什么？

translation.en: Now I wonder, who could have made all of this mess?
translation.zh: 我真纳闷 是谁弄得这么乱呀？
没错 我们克丽茜以前就这样

translation.en: That's still our Chrissy. Well, I think that was all of them.
translation.zh: 现在也这样 好了 应该全看完了

translation.en: Aw, you excited for Mama and Papa to get home, Cory?
translation.zh: 科里 爸爸妈妈要回来了 你高兴吗？

translation.en: Cory, let them through the door! Here, let me grab your bags, dear.
translation.zh: 科里 让他们进来！来 把包给我 亲爱的

translation.en: [Cory] I wanna see! Let me see!
Cory, meet your new baby sister, Chrissy.
translation.zh: 科里 这是你妹妹科丽茜

translation.en: I'm gonna show her my toys!
[Papa's mom] These really are special times.
And they go by so fast.
Mama go back to work now?
How about I hide and you seek?
